channel.title: Got Client working, but its different! Help!
channel.description:
Ok, so I recently posted a topic of Client.Silabsoft.org not working, and I finally got it working. Now that i have it working, It works like Moparscape. Items like: Bandos, Skillcapes, etc. Freeze when I get them.
And Silab never does that.
I was wondering if anyone knew why it froze and isn't like the old silabsoft.
Thank you

item.title: Got Client working, but its different! Help!
item.dc:creator: @IconsOfEvil IconsOfEvil
item.description:
@IconsOfEvil wrote:

Now, when i try to run clients, I get the message that Java is not reconginazble. ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 09:36:05 pm[/size][hr]BUMP

Read full topic

item.title: Got Client working, but its different! Help!
item.dc:creator: @_Urban !.::Urban.::!
item.description:
@_Urban wrote:

Well, you don’t necessarily have to have the client the creator uses, but it’s BEST if you do. Cause when you use the client the creator uses, it gives you less bugs and problems.
Here it is;
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=284690.0

item.source: Got Client working, but its different! Help!

item.title: Got Client working, but its different! Help!
item.dc:creator: @_Urban !.::Urban.::!
item.description:
@_Urban wrote:

It depends. Your server can get bugged in many ways if you use different clients, especially Silab.
I recommend you go to the Release Thread of your server source,and download the client.

If you download the client from your source, it’s most likely no bugs will be found.

For an example;
when I first started my server, I used Galkon’s client and my server was bugged.
I downloaded the client from the Source Maker, and everything worked perfectly.

What source do you use?

Read full topic
item.source: Got Client working, but its different! Help!
